# Status Documents

This directory contains current status and readiness assessments for BlazeDB.

## Build & Compatibility

- **BUILD_STATUS.md** - Current build status (core, features, distributed modules)
- **COMPATIBILITY_VERIFICATION.md** - Platform compatibility verification

## Production Readiness

- **BETA_PRODUCTION_READINESS.md** - Beta production readiness assessment
- **PRODUCTION_READINESS_REVIEW.md** - Production readiness review

## Integration Status

- **ENGINE_INTEGRATION_COMPLETE.md** - Engine integration completion status

---

These documents track the current state of BlazeDB and its readiness for different use cases.
